name: Cakes
details: Cakes, whether it's a classic vanilla or a decadent chocolate, are the life of the party! With each sweet slice, you're in for a delightful treat that's sure to satisfy your cravings. So, grab a plate, indulge in a piece, and let the sugary goodness bring joy to your taste buds. If you read and got here congrats.... now come for the event

name: Popcorn
details: Salt or sugar, popcorn's perfect for keeping your mouths busy during the party and cocktails. Whether you're mingling or dancing, this snack will keep you happily munching all night long.

name: Groundnuts
details: Groundnuts are a delicious and crunchy snack made from roasted peanuts. Perfectly seasoned with a pinch of salt and a hint of spice, they offer a satisfying, savory bite. Whether you're munching on them while watching a movie or enjoying them as an afternoon treat, groundnuts are a tasty and nutritious way to curb your cravings.
